cause.description:
On August 10-11 a magnificent event will be occurring in Walsenburg. Volunteers throughout Huerfano county along with the John Mall High School graduating class of 2007 will be hosting the first ever Relay for Life in Walsenburg. The event will be taking place from 7:00 P.M. through 7:00 A.M. at John Mall High School.
The Relay for Life is sponsored by the American Cancer Society. The American Cancer Society is the nationwide community-based voluntary health organization dedicated to eliminating cancer as a major health problem by preventing cancer, saving lives, and diminishing suffering from cancer, through research, education, advocacy, and service.
Since 1985 Relay for Life has raised over $1 billion to help fight cancer occurring in more than 4,000 communities in nine countries. Anyone and everyone is encouraged to help in the fight against cancer. Visit www.relayforlife.org to find out more about this wonderful event.
1. Raise donations
2. Find a cure for cancer
cause.mission: raise donations for research while celebrating survivorship.
